item.title: Builds
item.description: All Github Releases Release Download Git Message Conversations - May 09, 2020 [f424737] catch UnsatisfiedLinkError when trying to init libwebrtc. fixes #3707 Conversations - May 09, 2020 [1d9b9e3] pulled translations from transifex Conversations - May 08, 2020 [072edc5] hide microphone button in video-only calls. fixes #3700 Conversations - May 08, 2020 [bd0234b] dismiss incoming call notification on crash. fixes #3701 Conversations - May 08, 2020 [350fc57] properly wrap IPv6 addresses Conversations - May 06, 2020 [1b237e4] pulled translations from transifex Conversations - May 06, 2020 [42563e6] version bump to 2.
